price: Kandi (ababangikanyamana) bashyizeho ibigirwamana babibangikanya na Allah kugira ngo bayobye (abantu) inzira ye. Vuga uti “Nimwinezeze (by’igihe gito)! Ariko mu by’ukuri iherezo ryanyu ni mu muriro.”
arabic: وَجَعَلُواْ لِلَّهِ أَندَادٗا لِّيُضِلُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦۗ قُلۡ تَمَتَّعُواْ فَإِنَّ مَصِيرَكُمۡ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalū lillahi andādan liyuḍillū ʿan sabīlihi qul tamattaʿū fa-inna maṣīrakum ilā al-nāri
